alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 09 at 2:03PM PST until March 11 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THURSDAY TO 3 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range. * WHEN...From 3 PM Thursday to 3 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range
